faqs.question: Como puedo apostar a la final de la Copa de Oro?
answer_points: Step 1: Choose licensed sportsbook (FanDuel, BetMGM, etc.)
Step 2: Create account and deposit
Step 3: Navigate to Soccer > Gold Cup
Step 4: Select bet type and amount
Must be 21+ in most states

faqs.question: Que casa de apuestas ofrece mejores mercados para Gold Cup?
answer_points: bet365 - best soccer coverage globally
DraftKings - best props and SGPs
FanDuel - best overall user experience

faqs.question: Cual es el historial de finales de la Gold Cup?
answer_points: Tournament began in 1991
Mexico: 8 titles (most of any nation)
USA: 7 titles (second most)
Include last 5 finals with scores

faqs.question: Es Mexico favorito en la final de la Gold Cup?
answer_points: Mexico historically favored (8 titles)
Recent dominance in tournament
Check current odds for latest favorite status
